metadata.name: Failure And Success Series (#1 Failure)
metadata.description:
I have not failed, I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.”

 -Thomas Alva Edison

Only two pieces will be minted in the series. One failure and one success.

Modeling time : 7 hours
Animating time:  23 hours
Sound design: 4 hours
Render time: 18 hours (ray tracing)
Resolution: Full HD 1920 x 1080 MP4
